# pyspark_dubber.sql.functions.substring_index

```python
pyspark_dubber.sql.functions.substring_index(
	str: pyspark_dubber.sql.expr.Expr | str,
	delim: str,
	count: int,
)
```

[PySpark API Reference](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/reference/pyspark.sql/api/pyspark.sql.functions.substring_index.html)

!!! warning "Incompatibility Note"

    Negative counts are not supported.
